Standing next to Quickstrike, heard him say Megatron.  She shook with 
fear.  "OH no, Not me.  I'm not going to see hi either. No way in the 
pit am I going back there."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Quickstrike:
> 
> 
> Quickstrike stopped in his tracks, hearing what Black Arachnia just 
> said. "Oh no," he said, starting to back up. He clicked his massive 
> claws nervously. "Ah ain't goin' back there." He opened his comm-
link 
> to Black Arachnia. He knew he was going to get his head bit off, 
but 
> he had to say his word. "Listen sugar-bot. Ya don't understand. Ah 
> ain't goin' back there! Ah ain't goin' back t' Megatron." His voice 
> began to ring.
